name: Bucket Brawl: Ahlman Edition
description:
Bucket Brawl: Ahlman Edition is a frantic couch multiplayer about animal toys seeking to recycle each other in a world of plastic and raining buckets.

In Bucket Brawl, you'll engage in epic battles using buckets as your primary weapon. Toss buckets at your plastic friends, knock them off ledges, convert them into reusable material or send them on a train to hell. Strive to be the last toy standing. Choose from a variety of adorable animal characters and customize them with your preferred colors. Immerse yourself in exciting environments with map-specific mechanics. Don't kick the bucket, kick your friends' ass. It's time to make the world a better place.


  • It's raining buckets! Watch out for buckets falling from the sky. Pick up buckets and throw them at your friends. Buckets rebound from walls and obstacles so use them as your advantage.


  • Got bucketed? It's not over yet. Spam the throw button as fast as you can to get free before your friends get rid of you!


  • Goodbye! Push your plastic friends into traps or off the stage. Just converting waste into reusable material. Nothing personal.


  • Watch out for golden buckets! Hitting a player with a golden bucket will instantly send them to the heavens. The longer the rounds get, the higher the chance for golden buckets to appear.
  • 7 maps with their unique environments and obstacles
  • Don't have enough controllers? Bucket Brawl supports 2 players on the same keyboard (WASD and arrow keys)
  • Supports Xbox controllers and other popular PC gamepads
  • Bombastic soundtrack
